findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled can allow malicious websites to make authenticated requests on behalf of users to access WordPress API data.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage with JavaScript that makes XMLHttpRequest to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials. If user is logged into Plex, the request will succeed and return page data that can be exfiltrated to attacker's server.
